name: Piti
description:
Enjoy a nice game I made called Piti. This game is simple platform game where you need to collect all the fruits to pass to the next level. While the concept is simple, the game itself is not.

It is super challenging where you expect lots of game overs before completing the game. Can you handle such challenge? Give it a try.

P.S "This game does not have sound/highscore, yet. It will be implemented in the next release that you will get for free."
